Name: Trooper 1
About the game: Trooper1 This is a fun to play sidescroller in 3d style. Can you kill them all and can you get to the end, i challenge you!. The Update is now life,Better Textures beter aiming and more, we hope you like it,Have fun!! Controls A = Left S = Crouch D = Right F = Action Button Shift = Sprint or Jump over Q & E = Weapon select Tab = Melee Kick or Left Right Focus 1 = Game-Menu Mouse Controls Left Mouse = Shoot Right mouse = First Person Shooting Scroll Button = Stealth Kill
